Html:
Hi Jaimie,

It will be nice if you add a two new functions: GrantAccess and RevokeAccess for entyti Object with systemuser and team.

Today I use a solution from Jamie Miley: http://mileyja.blogspot.com/2011/05/grant-access-to-user-or-team-to-entity.html

It works well, but I would like to have an "all in one" solution.

 

Best regards,

FV

PS: I suggested this idea to Daniel, who is the author of a similar library CrmSvcToolkit. Who is faster?

Hey There.

Thanks for your suggestion. I am actually looking to add them in at some stage.

Maybe just they won't be an elegant solution, but i have a rough idea what i am after at this stage.

Thanks and Happy Coding.

Jaimie
